name: Spinnortality | cyberpunk management sim
description: Found a company, spread fake news, start riots and become immortal. In this cyberpunk management sim, wealth is power and corporations are king. Can you monopolize the globe and build a corporate empire that will stand forever?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 2 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel core i5 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
